coreAtributes.name: waitress dress
coreAtributes.description: A waitress dress that harkens back to the style of the 1950s.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the waitress dress's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc.her] head and buttoning up the shirt.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the waitress dress's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head and buttoning up the shirt.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the waitress dress's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head and harshly buttons up the shirt.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] unbuttons [npc.her] shirt and [npc.verb(pull)] off [npc.her] waitress dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] unbuttons [npc2.namePos] shirt and [npc.verb(pull)] off [npc2.her] waitress dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly unbuttons [npc2.namePos] shirt and [npc.verb(pull)] off [npc2.her] waitress dress.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] waitress dress back down, covering [npc.her] groin.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] waitress dress back down, covering [npc2.her] groin.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] waitress dress back down, covering [npc2.her] groin.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] waitress dress up to around [npc.her] waist, fully exposing [npc.her] groin.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] waitress dress up around [npc2.her] waist, fully exposing [npc2.her] groin.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] waitress dress up around [npc2.her] waist, fully exposing [npc2.her] groin.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] buttons up [npc.her] shirt and slips the apron on, covering [npc.her] chest and stomach.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] buttons up [npc2.namePos] shirt and slips the apron on, covering [npc.her] chest and stomach.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly buttons up [npc2.namePos] shirt and [npc.verb(push)] the apron over her head, covering [npc2.her] chest and stomach.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] unbuttons [npc.her] shirt and slips out of the apron, fully exposing [npc.her] chest and stomach.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] unbuttons [npc2.namePos] shirt and slips out of the apron, fully exposing [npc.her] chest and stomach.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly unbuttons [npc2.namePos] shirt and [npc.verb(yank)] her head out of the apron, fully exposing [npc2.her] chest and stomach.
